abstract: The institution named for the first chief justice, where a new building is about to be dedicated, was originally the College of Police Science, but students considered the acronym (COPS) undignified.
snippet: The institution named for the first chief justice, where a new building is about to be dedicated, was originally the College of Police Science, but students considered the acronym (COPS) undignified.

headline.main: How John Jay Got Its Name (but Not Who Suggested It)
